alert.note: Alert for Bon Homme; Hutchinson; Yankton (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 05 at 8:54AM MDT until further notice by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in South Dakota... James River near Scotland affecting Bon Homme, Hutchinson and Yankton Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Dakota... James River near Mitchell affecting Davison and Hanson Counties. James River near Forestburg affecting Sanborn County. James River at Huron affecting Beadle County. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in South Dakota... James River above Yankton affecting Yankton County. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...James River near Scotland. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 15.5 feet, 431st Avenue is flooded where it crosses the river in northwestern Yankton County. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM CDT Friday the stage was 14.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:30 AM CDT Friday was 14.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 13.1 feet by next Friday morning. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon James River Scotland 13.0 14.8 Fri 9 am 14.6 14.3 14.0 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Saturday morning by 1100 AM CDT.
